description:
Location: Calabasas, CA

Salary Range: $25/hr - $30/hr+ (based on experience)

In Office Role: 5 days a week 8:00 – 4:30pm (unpaid 1 hr lunch)

Medical/Dental and Vision offered

County Required Sick Days offered (No PTO)

Qualifications And Description
  • Executive Assistant to CEO – Must be very organized, responsive and ownership
  • Strong oral and written communication skills
  • Experience with calendaring and scheduling
  • Previous experience is a plus
benefits: Medical/Dental and Vision offered, County Required Sick Days offered (No PTO)
